metadata.name: Prism Cases
metadata.description: Floating above the soft undergrowth of an ancient forest, Prism Cases are the first artifact discovered within the Yativerse. The lore of the Hippogriffâ€™s ancestors is transcribed on the translucent walls of each Prism Case. When a Prism Case is unsealed, it explodes with the heat and ferocity of a solar flare and three wonderful Yats emerge. The full potential of the Prism Case is not yet known, but many believe the vast knowledge of the Yativerse awaits the beholder who can decipher the code.
